item.description:
PLEASE NOTE CHANGE TO ITINERARY!!!

Meet at 4:30 at Modern

We will be arranging carpools and head to our first stop BAR. There is a major event there later in the evening and we want to avoid the crush, so have reversed our start and end points.

We will proceed to Pepe's and Sally's and

END at Modern

Stacey's cell is 974-3170 Please contact her if your plans change or if you have a problem and have to catch us "en route."

We will leave Modern at 4:50 sharp!!! Please be on time so we can consolidate cars and make this an easier "crawl" for everyone.

Please remember that this is a $$$ CASH $$$ event.
Nanette
item.how_to_find_us: commit Stacey's photo to memory : ) or ask for the New Haven Dine Out Group

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: New Haven's BEST Pizza?????
